links.title: Apple (AAPL) Stock Analysis - Dividend Value Builder
links.description: Apple's iPhone and iOS operating system are known for their quality, security, and integration abilities. These are the backbone of a successful product lineup and have given Apple the ability to obtain premium prices (high profit margins) for their favored brand. Apple has a competitive advantage because of its sheer size and ability to vertically integrate.

https://9to5mac.com/2018/08/11/consumers-more-excited-about-new-iphones-than-samsung/

links.title: Consumers are far more excited about new iPhones than Samsung's latest flagship, survey shows
links.description: Earlier this week, Samsung officially unveiled its new Galaxy Note 9 flagship, but now a survey from indicates that consumers are far more excited about what Apple has in store for the iPhone this year... According to the survey, which asked 1,555 consumers what smartphone release they are most looking forward to, the "iPhone 9/iPhone 11/iPhone XI/iPhone SE 2" came in at the top.
